text: London Film Academy (LFA) is a British film school. It is located in Fulham, London, England. It was created in 2001 as a non-profit. The main purpose of the school is to teach courses on skills used to make movies. == History == London Film Academy was created in 2001. It was made to teach movie courses that focused on the art of celluloid filmmaking. The school has lecturers that were active within the movie industry globally. == References == Category:Movies Category:Schools in London Category:2001 establishments in England
title: London Film Academy
